oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: |han=kass'o's step-grandmother (Ttuai-an) joyfully adressed Canopus and Sirius when there was enough food to eat. 1) p.8467v: |han=kass'o observed this himself, 2) p.8468v: what the people say when food is abundant, 3) This story is found in Book VIII-28.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sirius and Canopus
